description: Tyler is 20 years old and originally from Georgia. He's 5' 7' and weighs around 130 lbs. This tight, compact Marine is having lots of fun out here in Southern California. Tyler played football, wrestled and ran track in high school back in Georgia. He says the wildest sexual experience he's ever had was having sex with a girl at her house when her mom suddenly comes home. To his surprise, the daughter didn't even stop when her mom came in and sat on the edge of the bed and started to undress. Sounds like a wild time. Major Wood has something in store for Tyler tonight, but it's 'fist pussy' instead of the real thing and Tyler seems just fine with that. Tyler pulls a sneak attack on the Major and blows a huge load all over the place. Major Wood is relentless and keeps milking the devil dog for all he's got.
title: Tyler, Scene #01
